verses.verse: And <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, which she gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And when <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3947>her<s%>, he took <S%H7901>her<s%>, and lay with <S%H6031>her<s%>, and defiled her.

And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>joined<s%> unto <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and he <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> unto the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>.
And <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Get<s%> me this <S%H3207>girl<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: now his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were with his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> until they were <S%H935>come<s%>.
And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H854>him<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H582>it<s%>: and the men were <S%H6087>grieved<s%>, and they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%>, because he had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5039>wickedness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H7901>lying<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>; which thing ought not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>.

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H2836>longs<s%> for your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: I pray you <S%H5414>give<s%> her him to <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And make you <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with <S%H5414>us<s%>, and give your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto <S%H3947>us<s%>, and take our daughters unto <S%H1323>you<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3427>live<s%> with <S%H776>us<s%>: and the land shall <S%H1961>be<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>; <S%H3427>live<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> you in it and get you possessions in <S%H270>it<s%>

And <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H1>father<s%> and unto her <S%H251>brothers<s%>, Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and what you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto me I will <S%H5414>give<s%>.

<S%H7235>Ask<s%> me ever so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H4119>dowry<s%> and <S%H4976>gift<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> according as you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5414>me<s%>: but give me the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully<s%>, and <S%H1696>said<s%>, because he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3808>them<s%>, We cannot <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> that is <S%H6190>uncircumcised<s%>; for that were a reproach unto <S%H2781>us<s%>:
But in <S%H2063>this<s%> will we <S%H225>consent<s%> unto <S%H2145>you<s%>: If you will be as we be, that every male of you be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>;

Then will we <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto <S%H3947>you<s%>, and we will take your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H3427>us<s%>, and we will live with <S%H259>you<s%>, and we will become one <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But if you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H4135>us<s%>, to be circumcised; then will we <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and we will be <S%H1980>gone<s%>.
And their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>, and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H309>waited<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%>, because he had <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: and he was more <S%H3513>honourable<s%> than all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with the <S%H582>men<s%> of their <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

These <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H8003>peaceful<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3427>us<s%>; therefore let them live in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5503>trade<s%> in it for the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H7342>behold<s%>, it is large <S%H3027>enough<s%> for <S%H6440>them<s%>; let us <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us for <S%H802>wives<s%>, and let us <S%H5414>give<s%> them our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Only <S%H2063>if<s%> will the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H225>consent<s%> unto us for to <S%H3427>live<s%> with <S%H259>us<s%>, to be one <S%H5971>people<s%>, if every <S%H2145>male<s%> among us be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, as they are <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>.

Shall not their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and their <S%H7075>substance<s%> and every <S%H929>animal<s%> of theirs be <S%H225>ours<s%>? only let us consent unto <S%H3427>them<s%>, and they will live with us.

And unto <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and unto <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> all that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>; and every <S%H2145>male<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, all that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, when they were <S%H3510>sore<s%>, that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H1783>Dinah<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H983>boldly<s%>, and <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H2145>males<s%>.

And they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> <S%H3947>out<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H2491>dead<s%>, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.

They <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and their <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and that which was in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and that which was in the <S%H7704>field<s%>,

And all their <S%H2428>wealth<s%>, and all their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and their <S%H802>wives<s%> took they <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> even all that was in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, you have <S%H5916>troubled<s%> me to make me to <S%H887>stink<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>: and I being <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>, they shall gather themselves <S%H622>together<s%> against <S%H5221>me<s%>, and slay me; and I shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>, I and my <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Should he <S%H6213>deal<s%> with our <S%H269>sister<s%> as with a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>?
